record.detail: Fictitious example database for R package rheurist

This fictitious database aims to illustrate functions proposed by the R package "rheurist" : for more details, see https://github.com/alietteroux/rheurist.
Remember to indicate the institution and/or project, target audience and nature of the content.

[{"name":"Page","type":"group","children":[{"name":"Content","type":"text","css":{},"content":"

This fictitious database aims to illustrate functions proposed by the R package \"rheurist\" : for more details, see https://github.com/alietteroux/rheurist.

\n

XML files of this database (exported from Heurist) can be downloaded on this Github repository.
